mdRecord.dcterms:description: Grigg's first architectural office; originally a single cottage at 910 West Main Street. Subsequently enlarged; served as commercial building for several businesses, including Holsinger's Photography Studio and Back Alley Disk records. Demolished early 21st century. [work]
